message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for 105.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm ready to pay $95 for the product.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I can offer you a slight discount to 102.50. It's the lowest I can go.
